entry.title: $2350 // Enormous Bushwick Two Bed with Private Deck!
entry.content:
2 Bed / 1 Bath on Wyckoff Ave - Unit: 2L in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs, Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs. Enormous Bushwick Two Bed with Private Deck! This stylish Bushwick two bed is massive with it's very own private deck space.

Contact Me directly at show contact info to schedule an appointment


AMENITIES
High Ceilings
Hardwood floors
Exposed brick
Outdoor Space
Private roof deck
Eat In Kitchen
Hardwood Floors
Natural Light in Living Area

entry.title: $1999 // Gorgeous One Bdrm Home office in Prime Bushwick Area / L M / No FEE
entry.content:
Please Read Carefully so there is No Misunderstanding!!

Qualifications
12 Month Lease is a Must!!
Good Credit and Income is a Must!! "40x Income and 680+ credit score"
Guarantor welcomed
Pet Friendly
LGBTQ Friendly

Hey everyone,

We have a Spacious One Bedroom Home office Rail Road style in Prime Bushwick Location. This Beautiful apartment includes

- Open Face Kitchen
- Full size Appliances
- High Ceilings
- Spacious layout
- Second Bedroom or Home Office option
- Over sized windows (Plenty of Natural sunlight)
- Over sized Closets
- Fully Tiled Bathroom
- Cable and Internet Ready!!
- Fire escape Access

Fantastic LOCATION! Equal distance from the Dekalb Ave L Line, and the Central M Line also access to all other mass transit. Easy commute "To and from the City'. Steps away from the Knickerbocker Ave and Wyckoff Ave which is filled with tons of restaurants, huge shopping areas, super markets, laundry mats, pop up shops, and so of the best night life this side of Brooklyn!! Also Down the street from Maria Hernandez Park!!

For more information or to schedule a showing, feel free to contact me Julian @ Anytime!! (Contact info in photos)
